0.8.name: wordpress/shiword
0.8.description: Simple dark theme with a lot of features, like a "quick links" menu, an "easy navigation" bar, a post slideshow, the custom header, the print preview and many other. Shiword is fully customizable (there's also a skin builder!), with one or two columns, up to 6 widgets areas, six custom widgets ( "Social links", "Popular Post", "Latest Activity", "User quick links", "Popular Categories", "Latest comment authors" and "Recent Posts in Category" ) and two menu. It supports custom menus, posts thumbnail and post formats.
